page.title: 05The school afternoon
page.content: We have two one-hour lessons with a 15 minute break at 2.30. We have {Art,Science,History,Geography,Music, {P.E.Games}and in the summer we also have{Athletics and Swimming}in the pool on the Infant site.We walk there and back in a crocodile. Because we are an{open plan school with no classroom doors,the afternoons are often less quiet than the mornings since we move around much more to the{cookery area,craft and {science room}or the{library}where we watch T.V.programmes often on{video. We wear a{school uniform}of blue and grey with a silver stripe in our tie. The uniform is not compulsory but most children wear it. At 3.45p.m. the bell rings and most children go home on foot or by car but the unlucky bus children have to wait as long as 30 minutes for their coach.
